message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you our premium product which we believe would be a great addition to your collection. Given its high value and quality, I propose a price of $100 for it. I understand its worth to you might be higher, but I hope this offer aligns with your budget while ensuring a fair transaction for us. Looking forward to your response.

Thank you for the offer, Alice. While I appreciate the product, $100 is a bit above my budget. I'm willing to pay $90 for it. This is a fair price for both of us, considering its value to you.  Let me know what you think.
